fù

媍字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fù］
［《廣韻》房久切，上有，奉。］
亦作“媍1”。“妇1”的繁体字。
(1)已婚女子。
(2)泛指妇女。
(3)妻。
(4)儿媳。

同婦。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fù］
["Guangyun" room for a long time, there is on it, Bong. ]
Also known as "媍1". Traditional characters for "女1".
(1) A married woman.
(2) Refers to women in general.
(3) Wife.
(4) Daughter-in-law.
